name: Car Driving School Sim 2023
description:
Car driving school simulator 2023 brings together enthusiasts who love racing games. You can play in multiplayer car games or single player! This game is designed for anyone who wants to have the perfect car driving experience online! Car driving school academy is the ultimate free car parking simulator game. Buckle up, driver, steer & learn to drive a car and follow road rules in this fun car game. Upgrde your skills to unlock cool cars and become a great driver!

GAME FEATURES
------------------------------------------
- car drift mode
- car parking mode
- car racing mode
- car traffic
- Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
- ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
- Explore a detailed open world environment.
- Excellent physics.
- Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or buttons
